article_text:
Marcel Diaz, manager of the Weichert, Realtors’ South Brunswick office, recently announced that his office will be sponsoring the local South Brunswick Athletic Association baseball program.

Members of the Weichert Realtors office in South Brunswick, sponsor of the South Brunswick baseball program. (Photo: Courtesy of Weichert Realtors) Story Highlights Marcel Diaz, manager of the Weichert, Realtors’ South Brunswick office, recently announced that his office will be sponsoring the local South Brunswick Athletic Association baseball program.

SOUTH BRUNSWICK Marcel Diaz, manager of the Weichert, Realtors’ South Brunswick office, recently announced that his office will be sponsoring the local South Brunswick Athletic Association baseball program.

“As a company, Weichert enjoys giving back to the communities we serve,” said Diaz. “We hope our support of the South Brunswick Athletic Association baseball program will help the organization achieve its goals to continue to provide a wide range of sports programs and special activities for the neighborhood.”

For more information or to learn about the real estate services that Weichert, Realtors has to offer, feel free to stop by the Weichert, Realtors’ South Brunswick office, located 3530 Highway 27 or call at 732-297-0200.

Since 1969, Weichert, Realtors has grown from a single office into one of the nation's leading providers of homeownership services by putting its customers first. A family of full-service real estate and financial services companies, Weichert helps customers buy and sell both residential and commercial real estate, and streamlines the delivery of mortgages and home and title insurance. Weichert leverages its customer website, www.weichert.com, one of the most visited real estate websites in the nation, to help families and individuals realize the dream of homeownership through quick and easy access to listing information and the services of its real estate professionals nationwide. For more information, Weichert's customer service center can be reached at 1-800-USA-SOLD.

Read or Share this story: http://mycj.co/1G3Qdxn
